regex: \b(at least one|one or more) of (.+?) and (.+?)\b
message: Should be interpreted as 'at least one of A and at least one of B'. See SuperGuide Corp. v. DirecTV Enterprises, Inc. (358 F.3d 870 (Fed. Cir. 2004)). # <https://www.reddit.com/r/patentexaminer/comments/te30e5/andor/i0pnysf/>

regex: \b(at least one|one or more) of (.+?) or (.+?)\b
message: Should be interpreted as 'at least one of A, or at least one of B'. See SuperGuide Corp. v. DirecTV Enterprises, Inc. (358 F.3d 870 (Fed. Cir. 2004)). # <https://www.reddit.com/r/patentexaminer/comments/te30e5/andor/i0pnysf/>
